info.name: Gmail Date+Time in Mail List
info.description: >>> new style with comfortable date+time has come!!! try it!!! <<< Gmail shows only time or date on mail list. This style shows Date + Time! For example... Before: - 9:00am - Sep 17 After: - Tue, Sep 18, 2012 at 9:00 AM - Mon, Sep 17, 2012 at 9:00 PM
